name: A Virtual Date!
description:
Hello my name is Tojiko Merata, play Virtual Date! and he spends some time with me chatting and... I think that's all we can do for now, hehe.

In this game you must have a date with Tojiko Merata, a nice and fun girl who likes to spend time with people talking and having a good time.

Features:

- A visual novel system that allows Tojiko's communication with you.

- Interesting conversation topics

- Listen to music

- Change the ZOOM of the camera to have Tojiko farther or closer

- Experience points that allow you to unlock new conversation topics

Description

Virtual Date! or A Virtual Date! is a dating sim game written in Python using the Pygame module and my own Len'Py module.

It was developed for GitHub Game Off 2022, but unfortunately couldn't be delivered on time.

This game is just a prototype, so it can be seen that some features are missing, and also that I cannot guarantee that it is bug free.

Help: Use the S key to take a screenshot of the game

Notes:

1. This game is free (GNU GPL v3) and open source.

2. It's just a prototype.

3. You are limited to a 1000 x 520 screen only for certain reasons.

4. The English translation is not verified and is not 100% correct.

5. Use part of the Lonely Imagination soundtrack due to time constraints.
